'''2.24.17''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on May 15, 2024.

== Changes ==
* Added [[15th Anniversary]] animations and content to the home page and a promo calendar of free items for players.
* Polished the home page.{{More info}}

== Fixes ==
* Fixes to game ownership and access.
* UI improvements.{{more info}}</onlyinclude>
